mutants.original_line: result += v if m == 'X' else m
mutants.mutated_line: result -= v if m == 'X' else m

mutants.original_line: for m, v in zip(mask, format(value, '036b')):
result += v if m == 'X' else m
mutants.mutated_line: result += v if m != 'X' else m

mutants.original_line: result += v if m == 'X' else m
mutants.mutated_line: result += v if m == '' else m
